member.name: T:DlhSoft.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Converters.MonthYearConverter
member.summary: Converts month start date values to their string month and year representation.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Converters.MonthYearConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Converters.MonthYearConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ListView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays a list of entity data items. Use Items property to add entity data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own entity data item collection. Alternatively you can set the EntityManagerSource to a customized entity manager to use and to ignore the items collection.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ListBox
member.summary: Contains a list of selectable entity data items. Use Items property to add entity data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own entity data item collection. Alternatively you can set the EntityManagerSource to a customized entity manager to use and to ignore the items collection.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector
member.summary: Represents a control that can be used to select items from among its child elements. Use Items property to add entity data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own entity data item collection. Alternatively you can set the EntityManagerSource to a customized entity manager to use and to ignore the items collection.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl
member.summary: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items. Use Items property to add entity data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own entity data item collection. Alternatively you can set the EntityManagerSource to a customized entity manager to use and to ignore the items collection.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase
member.summary: Represents the base of a control that can be used to present a collection of items.

The index to move the item to.

member.summary: Moves an item to a new index in the managed collection.
member.param: The index to move the item from.
The index to move the item to.

member.summary: Moves a range of items to a new index in the managed collection.

The count of items to move.
The index to move the items to.

member.summary: Gets the ItemsControl host template part used internally by this ItemsControlBase.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsItemsControlHostInitialized
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control is initialized and the ItemsControl host is available.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.Items
member.summary: Gets the collection used to generate the content of this ItemsControlBase.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of items used to generate the content of this ItemsControlBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.HasItems
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the ItemsControlBase contains items. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.EntityManagerSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom EntityManager object to use internally within this ItemsControlBase. When this property is set to an entity manager instance the control items collection is ignored. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.EntityManager
member.summary: Gets the EntityManager object that is used internally for managing entities displayed by this ItemsControlBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.ManagedEntities
member.summary: Gets the entity collection managed by this ItemsControlBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.LoadedEntities
member.summary: Gets the entities that are currently loaded within this ItemsControlBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.LoadedEntitiesSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the overriding source collection for loaded entities that would be displayed in the items control host of the control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsLoadingEntities
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control is currently loading entities (asynchronously). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsAsyncPresentationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to load managed entities asynchronously within this ItemsControlBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledMinCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial entity count to load synchronously within this ItemsControlBase before initiating the asynchronous load mode when IsAsyncPresentationEnabled property is set to true. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledPageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial entity count to load synchronously within this ItemsControlBase before initiating the asynchronous load mode when IsAsyncPresentationEnabled property is set to true. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.Count
member.summary: Gets the count of entities managed by this ItemsControlBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsEntityManagerInternal
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current EntityManager is internal.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsAsyncPresentationDeferred
member.summary: Gets (or sets, for inheriters) a value indicating whether the asynchrnous data loading is currently deferred.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsControlBase.IsAsyncPresentationDeferredChanged
member.summary: Occurs when IsAsyncPresentationDeferred value is changed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Style that is applied to the container for element generated for each item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount

member.summary: Holds the list of items that constitute the content of an items control.

member.summary: Removes all items from the ItemCollection.

member.summary: Copies the elements of the ItemCollection to an array, starting at a particular array index.

The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
